/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, adding depth and complexity to the image. Cars and people can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting with the more muted tones of the buildings and cars.
